name: IOWarp Core (CPU-only)
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'git config --global --add safe.directory /workspace && sudo rm -rf /home/iowarp/.ssh && if [ -d /tmp/host-ssh ]; then sudo cp -r /tmp/host-ssh /home/iowarp/.ssh && sudo chown -R iowarp:iowarp /home/iowarp/.ssh && chmod 700 /home/iowarp/.ssh && chmod 600 /home/iowarp/.ssh/* 2>/dev/null || true && chmod 644 /home/iowarp/.ssh/*.pub 2>/dev/null || true; fi && if [ -d /tmp/host-claude ] && [ "$(ls -A /tmp/host-claude)" ]; then sudo cp -r /tmp/host-claude /home/iowarp/.claude && sudo chown -R iowarp:iowarp /home/iowarp/.claude; fi && if [ -f /tmp/host-claude.json ] && [ -s /tmp/host-claude.json ]; then sudo cp /tmp/host-claude.json /home/iowarp/.claude.json && sudo chown iowarp:iowarp /home/iowarp/.claude.json; fi && sudo chmod 666 /var/run/docker.sock && sudo service ssh start && eval "$(~/miniconda3/bin/conda shell.bash hook)" && echo "Conda initialized. Use: conda activate <env>"'
